policy: path "sys/health" {capabilities=["read","sudo"]} path "sys/policies/acl" {capabilities=["list"]} path "sys/policies/acl/*" {capabilities=["create","read","update","delete","list","sudo"]} path "auth/*" {capabilities=["create","read","update","delete","list","sudo"]} path "sys/auth/*" {capabilities=["create","update","delete","sudo"]} path "sys/auth" {capabilities=["read"]} path "secret/*" {capabilities=["create","read","update","delete","list","sudo"]} path "sys/mounts/*" {capabilities=["create","read","update","delete","list","sudo"]} path "sys/mounts" {capabilities=["read"]}
